Kari had just left her bedroom thinking that this would just be another ordinary day (well, as ordinary as it could be for a teenager who saves the world from evil with a digital cat as her partner). She thought that her dream was just that; a dream. She was very wrong. It was actually a precursor to what was about to happen to her. She had just stepped outside to soak in the morning scenery when she noticed that her crest of light was glowing. Not it's usual pink glow either, it was glowing in a bright crimson color this time!

At first, Kari wondered what was going on, but she quickly remembered her dream. Knowing from the dream that this abnormal glow would soon be followed be an even more abnormal growth spurt, Kari ran as far away from her house as she possibly could. She had already crushed it once, and she didn't want that to happen again; especially considering that it wasn't just a dream this time. Kari had just barely put a safe distance between herself and the house when she began to shoot upward. Just like in her dream, she continued growing until she reached a size of 200 feet tall.

She knew from her dream that she could control her size with her mind, and immediately tried to shrink back to her normal size. At first it appeared to be working, as her body dwindled back closer and closer to the ground. However, when she reached a height of 50 feet tall, her shrinking came to an abrupt halt. Kari wondered what had gone wrong.

"Hey, what gives! Why am I still huge! I can't go anywhere like this... I'll just end up crushing everything without even trying to... This is not good! Come on body, go back to normal!"

Kari tried and tried to shrink back to her original size, but to no avail. It seemed that 50 feet tall was as short as she could get now!

"Ugh... This is just fantastic... Now I'm stuck like this... Well, it might not be all bad. After all, I can probably help a lot more people now than I could before. Maybe society could use a giant protector like me! I guess if I'm stuck like this from now on, I might as well make the best of it..."

Kari, now a giant goddess with a mission to aid the citizens and make their lives easier in any way possible, began walking toward her next destination.

"...The only options available are kill the energy source or create an exactly opposite field using Juggarnaught..." The other tracker replied.

"...An exact opposite?" Yamaki thought out loud.

"We'd have to make another giantess utilizing a field polarized to hers..." A researcher reported, looking over data following across his computer screen. "It'll have to be someone who's been around digimon extensively..."

"Okay, then we'll...
113122212.title: Calm before the strom

choices: Jeri immediately goes after an oblivious Rika.
Rika and Takato move on with their date.
1131222122.content:
Jeri walked shyly forward, shaken by memories the Hypnos building brought on. She'd been called and talked into coming by Yamaki, though now she was having second thought, remembering what happened here before.

She was brought out of her haze as Yamaki greeted her, immediately asking her to help him.

"Why do you want my help? I don't think I can do anything to stop her." Jeri disheartedly murmured.

"We can give you the power to stop her, but only if you're going to use it to help us." Yamaki said, leading her to a specially prepared scaffold.

"But I don't think I can fight..." She spoke softly, trying to hide her voice under the sounds of various tool rushing to complete the structure around them.

"...You remember how Takato saved you from D-Reaper? This is your chance to repay him." Yamaki distractedly told her, overviewing the progress made so far.

"Takato?" Jeri, alarmed, spoke normally for the first time since her arrival.

"Yes, we've tracked his digivice's signal. It overlaps where the giantess is. He may need saving." Yamaki replied, noticing her reaction.

"Takato...It's my chance to save you now." Jeri declared while Yamaki signaled those building to leave.

"Yes, it is. All you have to do is get on this platform." Yamaki gestured, Jeri nodded and advanced.

With an all clear Juggarnaught charged up, dosing Jeri with its power. With a blinding flash that engulfed the city, Jeri appeared, ready to save Takato from a fate he actually doesn't mind at all.
1131222122.title: Jeri's turn.

choices: Rika tries to talk some sense into the other giantess
Rika wants to make Jeri behave...by any means necessary
11312221222.content:
"Did you see that, Rika?" Takato cried. "That light was from the Hypnos building!"

"It was probably only a matter of time before they found out about me. Damn Yamaki..." Rika muttered. Rika, still carrying Takato in her palm, began to walk...away from the city.

"Rika, where are we going?!" Takato asked, a bit frantic. "They're probably activating Juggernaut or something!! We might be in danger!"

The redheaded giantess just kept walking. "All the more reason to head AWAY from the city, gogglehead. Less chance of stepping on someone, anyway."

Takato opened his mouth to say something, but then immediatly shut it. She WAS right.

"Anyway..." Rika said, with a slightly more seductive tone, "we need to start our date SOMETIME...better sooner than later, don't you think?" she grinned down at him.

Takato was all for a date with a giant, big-breasted Rika, but could anyone blame him if pictures of himself getting incinarated by a missile from an F-16 kept popping into his head?

"Don't worry, goggles." Rika said reassuringly, her head turned away from his face. "I have a feeling that this new body of mine can take anything that anyone throws at us..."


****************************************

Jeri stared at her new gigantic self. She was powerful now, she could feel it to her core. But that wasn't the only thing that was different. She had become like Rika in every way...her clothes had grown with her, but fit her like a second skin; her breasts, hips, and butt had all ballooned to impossible proportions, the imperfections in her face and skin had all but disappeared, and her red hair now cascaded down her shoulders and back.

Her thoughts turned to Takato. "I have to help him..." she thought. Suddenly, a new feeling swept over her, one that had swept over Rika: an intoxicating euphoria. "Takato..." she thought."We broke up...it didn't work out like we thought it would..." but then, unlike Rika, who after being hit by the waves of horniness had allowed rationality to resume control over her thoughts, Jeri's mind started deterirating. She began to have wild, savage thoughts of lust towards her tiny ex. "I...ME can MAKE it work...ME MAKE TAKATO LIKE ME AGAIN!!" She took a gigantic step forward, paying no attention to the fleeing crowds below her. "WANT TAKATO!!!" she thundered in a now much huskier voice, one that had seemed inticing on Rika, but seemed meanacing on Jeri. She soon began to break into a full-fledged run, shaking the city with each step she took. Jeri was no longer Jeri...Jeri was now a lust-crazed savage behemoth who didn't care what she did to anything or anyone as long as she got what she wanted...

And what she wanted was Takato.

***************************************

"Well, here we are." Rika said, bending over to let Takato out of her palm. Takato's shoes met with sand, as he gazed out into the open ocean.

"The beach?" He said, turning to his giant date.

"It's the only place I figured that was big enough for me to have fun in too." Rika looked about the beach, carefully examining it for any humans who hadn't ran at the sound of the emergency sirens that had been blaring non-stop since her growth spurt. She leaned over and peered under one umbrella to find a single man huddled next to his beer cooler, mumbling that he didn't want to die.

She poked him with one of her huge fingers. He immediatly sprang up, coming to stare into her beautiful gigantic face.

"HIT THE ROAD, BUD." she told him. That was all that he needed to hear. He immediatly sprinted to his car and left the parking lot all in less than a minute.

"Well, I think that's the last of 'em." Rika said. Then she did something Takato found quite unexpected... she took off her pants. And her shirt. She shucked off her shoes and socks, and lastly took off the band that kept her hair in a ponytail, letting it fall freely against her back.

The most gorgeous female that Takato had ever layed eyes upon had, without provokation, taken off every last article of clothing except her black underwear in front of him. Needless to say, his jaw was scraping along the ground.

"I take it that you like what you see." Rika said. She then sat down and stretched her titanic body across the sand on her back. She then motioned to Takato to come her direction. He did so, and she scooped him up and placed him on her stomach.

"Enjoy." she said simply before leaning her head back and closing her eyes.

Takato simply just stretched himself across her belly, hugging her soft flesh and taking in her warmth. "Rika... you're being so nice to me..." he muttered, although he was saying it more to himself, since he would have to shout in order for her to hear anything he said.

He took in her fragrance, and was immediatly absorbed in it, letting all of the worlds problems float out of his mind. Just as he began to doze off into plesant sleep, Takato buried his face in her flesh and muttered something that he for the first time truly realized:

"Rika...I love you..."

Rika, who wasn't really asleep, layed on of her hands on top of his body to cover him like a blanket. While there was no way that Rika could possibly have heard Takato's declaration of love to her, it was rather remarkable that at that moment, Rika thought to herself "Takato...I'll tell you I love you when you wake up..." then she thought of having to save face as a tough girl. "And then I'll twist your little arm until you promise not tell anyone until I SAY TO..." she grinned at the thought.

All would have continued in this dreamy, romantic state, if at that moment, Rika hadn't heard the distant booming of footsteps...

Jeri was coming.
11312221222.title: Jeri is coming.

choices: Rika actually knocks some sense back into Jeri
113122212221.content:
Takato awoke to the sound of thunder in the distance. "How long did Rika let me sleep? Wouldn't she have gotten me up if it were going to rain?" he thought. He looked up, expecting rainclouds, only to be greeted by blue skies and a worried look on his giant girlfriend's face, which was looking in the direction of the noise.

"Takato...get up." Rika said solemnly.

He did so, and as she placed him back on the ground, she began collecting her giant discarded clothes, which she had absent-mindedly tossed about the beach.

"I can't make out what it is." Takato said, trying to see past the sun's glare. "Rika...what do you think it is?"

"Get back to you on that, goggles." she said, trying to fit her gloriously engorged ass into her jeans as fast as she could.

"...Is...IS THAT...WHAT I THINK IT IS??!!!" Takato almost screamed.

Rika turned around, finishing her ensamble with a ponytail. "Is wha-OH MY GOD!!!"

They screamed at almost the same time "JERI?!!"

It was true; a gigantic Jeri was running straight towards them.

Takato tried to open his mouth to say something to Jeri, but Rika cut him off before he could. "Takato, something's wrong."

Takato looked, and he saw what she was referring to. Jeri had a mad look on her face, almost like an animal. She would periodically stop, to step on a building or a car, before continuing her march forward. She was loving the destruction she was causing, and that was completely out of character for Jeri.

"Takato, hop on." Rika said, putting her hand down. Takato nodded, hoping on, as she placed his tiny form in the safety of her pocket. It wasn't exactly comfortable, as the jeans were stretched to the limit to try and fit in her massive ass-flesh, but Takato could get over the discomfort; there were more important things to think about.

Jeri finally ran up to come face to face with Rika. She was seething with a crazed smile marring her otherwise pretty face. "RIKA..." she said almost dreamily, as if remembering something from long ago that she had forgotten. "RIKA...LIKE ME..." She said, rubbing her new flesh over with her hands.

Rika gave her a cold stare. "Jeri, what happened to you?"

Jeri's head snapped to attention, her mind having been preoccupied in felling herself over. She snarled at Rika. "TAKTO...WANT...TAKATO..."

Rika cocked an eyebrow. "She wants Takato?...Why is she talking like that?...That must be it...her mind's regressed...the same thing almost happened to me...I felt it before...I guess Jeri's mind wasn't sharp enough to stop the primal urges from taking over..." she thought.

"WHERE TAKATO??!!" Jeri yelled at Rika before lunging at her. Of course, had Jeri been in her right mind, she'd have known better than to mix it up with a tough girl like Rika. Rika saw her wild attack coming and simply scooted out of the way, placing her foot in Jeri's path. Jeri tripped, and fell face-first in the sand.

"Rika, be careful, but try not to hurt her! I don't want either of you hurt!" Takato said to Rika, feeling a bit helpless in this battle of behemoths. Rika nodded in response, reading herself for Jeri's next onslaught. Takato probably would've been better off if he had kept his mouth shut, because the sound of his voice had attracted his giantess ex.'s attention. She saw his head sticking out of Rika's pants pocket, and was barely able to recall her own words from only a little while ago:

"Takato, it's my chance to save you now..."

Jeri roared, picking herself back up.

"Jeri...don't do this..." Rika tried to prevent a battle from ever starting, but she knew that it was futile.

Takato was trying to get himself repositioned, having been shaken around by Rika's sudden movement. Jeri saw him straining with the confines of Rika's pockets and assumed that Rika was doing something to hurt him.

"YOU...HURT...TAKATO?!!" Jeri seethed.

"Hurt me?" Takato blurted out in a shocked and confused tone. Of all the crazy things that had happened today, that had to be the most startling to him. Frankly, he was more afraid of Jeri hurting him than Rika. "No, Jeri, I'm fine, see?" He said, smiling.

"I'm not hurting him, Jeri, but I'm afraid you might. Just calm down." Rika was trying her best to be reasonable with Jeri.

"GIVE ME TAKATO!!!!!!!" Jeri said, lunging herself straight at Rika.

The battle of the giant redheaded tamers had only just begun.
113122212221.title: The battle of the beautiful behemoths

1131222122211.content:
Jeri made another pass at Rika, only to have her stomach greet Rika's fist.

"Jeri, I'm sorry." Rika said, as Jeri fell to the ground, gasping for breath. "But this is for your own good."

"Jeri, please, stop!" Takato yelled frantically. He bit his lip, almost to the point of drawing his own blood, in rage. He felt so helpless...he would just have to put his faith in Rika's ability to take Jeri on without hurting her.

Jeri was struggling to get her wind back. She struggled to get back on her feet, only to have Rika put a hand on her shoulder.

"Takato, hold on to something." Rika said simply.

Just as Takato grabbed hold of the seams on the edge of Rika's pants pocket, Rika flipped Jeri over with one hand onto her back, and flung herself down on top of Jeri, holding Jeri pinned to the ground. Takato was doing his best not to hurl on this strange yet sexy roller coaster he called a girlfriend.

Jeri struggled, but it was to no avail. The two giantesses might've been similarly endowed, but a chasm of physical strength and endurance still existed between the two. Rika was stronger; it was as simple as that.

Takato was very much aroused. He might've broken up with Jeri, but he had to admit that she was terribly attractive as a giantess, and seeing his new love intrest pressing her now-massive breast-flesh against his old flame's similarly endowed breast-flesh was almost too much for him.

"Jeri...please stop...this isn't you..." Takato tried to reason with Jeri.

Jeri looked at Takato, and then at Rika, then at Takato, and then at Rika again. The angry lines on her face started to soften.

Then Takato had an idea. He started pulling himself out of the safety of Rika's pocket, and ended up hopping out of it to land on the soft pillow that was Jeri's waist.

"TAKATO!! WHAT ARE YOU DOING?!!" Rika said, frantically. She had just spent the last hour spilling out her heart and soul to this boy; she was NOT about to lose her new love interest.

"Rika...Jeri just wants what she's always wanted..." Takato said, his eyes locking on to Rika's.

Rika was about to protest, but suddenly she understood. "Alright. Go for it, goggles. I'll help, too."

Takato made his way up to Jeri's face, her struggling having all but stopped. He crawled up to her chin, and turned to nod his head in Rika's direction.

Rika was worried, but she had faith in Takato. She nodded in reply, and loosened her grip on Jeri's limbs. Instead, she began to wrap her arms around Jeri in a soft but firm bear hug. At the same time, Takato wrapped his arms around a portion of her massive face, uttering words of consolation. "We love you, Jeri..." The two muttered over and over. Soon, the anger had disappeared from Jeri's face altogether, being replaced by a look of peace. She closed her eyes, allowing herself to be lulled to sleep.

After the couple was sure that the out-of-control giantess was fast asleep, they backed out of the two-way hug, both resting themselves on the beach, totally exhausted.

"You think she's gonna be back to normal when she wakes up?" Takato asked.

"She should be. The same thing nearly happened to me...it should only be temporary...I hope." Rika replied.

Suddenly, Jeri's massive form began to stir. Takato allowed Rika to place him in her pants pocket once again, the new couple ready for anything...
1131222122211.title: She just wants a little love...

choices: The two of them fell towards Takato
11312221222111.content:
Jeri rose again with a groan. “What happened?” she groggily muttered, rubbing her head.
“Jeri?” Rika offered her a hand to get up. “Are you alright now?”
Jeri stared dumbly at Rika for a moment before anger swelled up on her face. She slapped the hand away. “What have you done to Takato? Where is he!?”
“Jeri, calm down he’s right…” Rika started, turning around slightly to reach her back pocket.
Jeri wasn’t waiting though, she tackled Rika from the side, both of them crashed off the beach. As Rika started to get up Jeri spotted something in her pocket and quickly stole it. It was Takato. “Takato, I’m here to rescue you.” She said happily, having forgotten the struggle earlier.
“Jeri, stop, Rika’s…” He started to say, cut off as she embraced him by pressing him to her now enhanced chest. But Rika was standing again.

“It would appear you choose too hastily.” One of the researchers muttered to Yamaki who nervously flicked his lighter open and closed.
“She’s even more destructive than any of the digimon were!” A tracker shouted, an image of Rika trying to gently wrest Takato from her rival’s hands filled the screen. They tripped into a small building along the coastline.
“We’ll just have to destroy them then. Prepare the anti-digimon weapons we developed.” Yamaki’s lighter flicked close violently.
“What about Takato, sir?” The other tracker asked.
“…We have no other choice. The preparations will take a few hours, we’ll have to hope he escapes by then.” Yamaki turned and left.

“Jeri, listen!” Takato shouted uselessly, neither girl could hear him anymore. They were to distracted by the other’s attempts to get him. Both tried to be gentle, but he was still repeatedly squeezed and horribly shaken by the constant struggle. He had to stop this soon, before either he or one of the girls got seriously hurt…but what could he do?
Suddenly the violent lifts and drops stopped, he was on solid ground again. “TAKATO, RUN!” Jeri shouted, wrestling Rika away.
11312221222111.title: Is it over?

choices: Rika and Takato pick up where their date left off.
Big suprise, Hypnos goes on the attack.
113122212221112.content:
No...Jeri and Rika both thought at the same time, as they realized that they had both jerked each other too hard and were now off-balance, and were about to crash right into the ocean, directly in a path that contained Takato.

Takato didn't like ironies like this. Both girls had feelings for him, both were only thinking about his safety. Unfortunatly, a breakdown in communication between them was about to be the cause of his death.

He was staring, helpless, as the two beautiful giantesses were speeding towards him. He could feel the air displacement blow the sand and water around him back, he himself was struggling to stand up.

He didn't want to die...he hadn't seen Guilmon again, he hadn't been able to explain to Jeri how he felt for Rika, but how he didn't want that to affect their friendship.

If he died now, he'd never be able to tell Rika how he really felt.

Guilmon...Rika...Jeri... the three names floated in his head over and over...he'd never felt so helpless.

Then a new feeling emerged inside him...one that gave him unprecedented strength.

"That's enough." he said simply.

The Hazard symbol glowed fiercly red on his D-Power.

And on his forehead.

**********Hypnos**********

Every screen in the complex, every last computer monitor, glowed a bright red Hazard symbol. The keyboards and other assorted input devices froze up.

Hypnos was silenced by the Hazard.

"Fine." Yamaki said, closing the top of his lighter. "Three targets, two large, and the other small. We can deal with that."

*********Beach************

Both Rika and Jeri were too preoccupied with thoughts of how to stop themselves from crushing the boy to realize that he was no longer in danger. They both hit the sand, to realize that...

THEY WERE SMALL AGAIN!!!

They both got up, and looked each other and themselves over. They were their normal height, and they looked like themselves again, flatchested and unnattractive in comparison to their giantess forms.

Takato, now normal again himself walked over to them.

"Are you two alright?" he cried.

All he recieved was a big fist in the face.

Rika's blow landed him in the sand.

"If you're going to unleash the Hazard to protect yourself, goggle-brain..." Rika growled, "then use it to teleport yourself or something!! What do you want me to do, BEG you to give me my power back again?!" she practically screamed.

"Can it really do stuff like that?" Jeri asked, somewhat astonished. She had thought that the Hazard only had the power to destroy through Megidramon.

"Well, if it can shrink us, who KNOWS what else it can do!"

"I didn't take it away!" Takato cried, still reeling back from Rika's blow. "I just suppressed it!"

"Suppressed it?!" Rika said, amazed that she had overlooked this herself, being that the power was inside HER and not HIM.

"You two could've shrunk anytime you wanted to! Didn't you know that?"

"No! How did YOU know?!" Rika cried.

"I used the Hazard to connect to the power that was inside both of you. Even though they were polar opposites, they were both otherwise identical. All I did was connect to your own D-Power and used it to hold the power back. It's no different from digivolving!"

Rika and Jeri looked at each other. "So that means...?" Jeri started.

"Only one way to find out." Rika said simply. She then began to think about the strange power she had felt inside her when she was huge-to her, it was more like an instinct than a memory.

Her body surged; she grew at least two feet, and her figure transformed into a miniture version of her giantess form. She was no less curvy, just a smaller scale replica. This was her Amazon form.

"Wow." Rika said. "I can control the transformation and the height!"

Jeri did similarly. "You always had that power, I guess you were just too caught up in what was going on to notice it." Takato explained.

Rika and Jeri both transformed back. Jeri looked sheepishly at Rika. "So...I guess you weren't trying to hurt him, huh?"

"Yeah. Your goof." Rika said, a little peeved.

"I guess I owe you two an apology." Jeri said.

"Now that that's over with," Takato said, "Umm, I'd kinda like to know how you two got big in the first place."

Rika realized she'd never told Takato the manner of her transformation, and Jeri would have to bear the bad news that Hypnos now considered Rika a threat.

And thus began a long series of explainations.
113122212221112.title: The little guy's a Hazard

1131222122211121.content:
******************************************************
Since the two giantesses had suddenly dissappeared from Hypnos' screens and the Hazard had quieted again, Hypnos went on standby just long enough for Takato, Jeri, and Rika to arrive and clear everything up.

Takato and Rika (reluctantly) decided to postpone their date until it was obvious that Rika and Jeri could be trusted with their new powers.

Hypnos immediatly began running tests to try and find a cure for the "GTS-Condition", using samples from Jeri as a guinea pig (Rika wouldn't hear of getting cured, Jeri just thought it would be a good idea to have a cure ready in case one of the two of them went berserker again).

After extensive testing of both mind and body, Hypnos finally concluded that Rika and Jeri both had control over their powers, and that it would be safe to allow limited use of those powers in public.

Rika and Jeri were not unheard of in the public eye already (THEY HAD HELPED SAVE THE WORLD, and it wasn't like the TV cameras had not noticed who the two behemoths looked very much like. However, the public actually accepted it as much as can be expected. After all, was it really THAT strange after everything that had ALREADY happened?

So, everything actually turned out OK.

(Writer's note: Why? Because there are much more interesting things I can do with this story than resolve boring acceptance issues.)

Anyway, we enter in two months later, and today is the day of Takato and Rika's third date (not including the giantess incident). Now, Takato and Rika have by no means what can be called a normal relationship; their dates have been mostly Takato obediantly doing whatever Rika wanted him to, without any public displays of affection, like seeing movies or quiet and thoughtful walks on the beach. In return, Rika would take Takato home and give him private card game lessons (which was kept entirely between them) and a few minutes of pure bliss between Takato and Rika at various sizes (nothing sexual, just hand-holding, snuggling, you know, dignified affection).

We now continue our regularly-scheduled story.
******************************************************

"I just don't get it." Takato said, walking in the park side-by-side with Rika, "You and Jeri both have the same powers. Why don't they hold testing for both of you at the same time?"

"Two reasons, Gogglebrain." Rika replied dryly. "One: they still don't entirely trust either of us to behave around each other. We tried to rip each other apart the first time."

"What's the other reason?"

"We recieved those powers by different means. They wanna treat us both as two entirely different instances."

"Well, at least they're nice enough to trust you out in the open." Takato tried to defend Hypnos.

"Yeah, well, I had to prove it to them, if you remember. Besides," she stopped to watch two high school girls gasp in suprise from the other side of the street, then run off giggling about who they'd just seen. "People actually trust us."

"Well, you earned that too, if you remember. Remember the apartment building?"

"Yeah." She muttered, trying not to sound like it was a big deal. She had been walking to school when she had seen the building catch fire. Not only did she rescue the trapped inhabitants, she had actually put the fire out by knocking over a fire hydrant, drinking the water, and spitting it back onto the fire. The fire trucks had only just arrived when Rika had already put out most of the flames. "Yeah, I remember. It was no big deal."

Takato stopped in front of her. "It WAS a big deal. You saved a lot of people."

Rika just looked away. It wasn't in her to feel like she was a heroine, although she did appreciate Takato trying to make her feel like one.

"Rika..." Takato tried to put a comforting hand on her shoulder, but she caught his hand before he could land it; her grip told him that he was about to do a no-no. She shot a glare at him.

Then she smirked and whispered "Not here."

Takato retracted the arm, giving a knowing glance. She wouldn't be caught dead having a moment of emotional weakness, and she would certainly not have Takato comfort her...in public.

The small smirk gone and the icy cold indifference returned to her features, Rika resumed her walk, with Takato in tow. Takato knew it might be a long, long time before she was willing to admit that they were in a relationship, but he was patient. After all, with every date, Rika was getting more and more affectionate. Of course, it was nothing like that fateful day when she gained her GTS powers; that had been the most affectionate instance at all. Takato and Rika both wanted to have another day like that, but Rika would not rush into it. Fortunately, Takato was understanding. She liked that about him. Among other things.

Suddenly, the writer decided to throw a monkey wrench in the works.

A light opened up and enveloped them both. They had no time to react, not even scream. In another second, they were gone.

***********Somewhere between space and time***********

"WHAT THE FU*K?!!!" Rika screamed as she and Takato landed face-first onto a cold metal floor. Takato, caught off-gaurd, lost his lunch everywhere (except on Rika). She still hit him on the back of his head for such a close call. "Keep it together goggles!"

"Where are we?" Takato said, having collected his thoughts.

"THAT might be a clue..." Rika said thoughtfully, pointing up to a banner hung on the gray metal walls of the hallway in front of them.

The banner said:

"WELCOME TO THE FIRST ANNUAL INTERDIMENSIONAL GIANTESS TOURNAMENT!
PLEASE PROCEED TO THE FRONT"

"The first annual WHAT?!" Takato nearly screamed.

"Okay, let's go." Rika said simply, walking forward.

"Rika! I-!..." Then Takato realized that going forward was probably the smart choice-it was probably the only way to find out what was going on.

Besides, he trusted her.

They walked out of the hallway into a giant gray colliseum. There were others there two, each in a pair. There was one girl and one boy in each pair. Rika and Takato instantly recognized Jeri and Henry and ran to the two. "Guys! Man, its great to see you guys! Any idea what's going on?" Takato asked.

"Rika! Takato! I knew they'd get to you guys! After all, Rika beat me." Jeri said, smiling, with Henry by her side. "We don't really know what's going on either, none of us do, but we're guessing that it involves giantesses fighting. Everyone here is from a different dimension, one in which the girl chosen was given powers identical to you and Jeri."

"So we're ALL giantesses?" Rika said, looking around. "We ALL have these powers?"

"They got them through different means, of course." Jeri said. "Also, you won't believe who we found here, too..." Jeri then pointed to the crowd.

There, Rika and Takato's jaws respectively dropped as they saw none other than Sora and Tai in the crowd, hand-in-hand!

(Yup, it is now a crossover! Welcome to the Interdimensional Giantess Tourney, the IGT!

1131222122211121.title: The beginning of the IGT!

choices: Rika convinces Takato to leave (Normal Story continues)
Takato convinces Rika to leave (IGT Story Continues)
11312221222111211.content:
"A Tournament? This will be awesome!" Takato said excitedly. He looked over to Rika, when he noticed she looked like she was thinking about something. He was about to ask her when...

Meanwhile on the way to the Server Continent, Mondomon briefs Lillymon on the obstacles she and Mondomon must overcome to reach the Team M.O.N.D.O. Fortress....

Mondomon: "Lillymon..."

Lillymon: "Yes, Mondomon?"

Mondomon: "I know I should have told you this earlier, but once we get to the dimensional warp. We have to go fight off an army of Mondomon to reach Team M.O.N.D.O.'s fortress."

Lillymon: "What do you mean?"

Mondomon: "I think that Team M.O.N.D.O. has figured out by now that I would defect to someone else's side. The Mondomon digimon are patrolling eight areas and the fortress is protected by a forcefield. The only way we can deactivate the forcefield is by defeating the eight Mondomon digimon."

Lillymon: "That won't be a problem."

Mondomon: "Actually, YES it would be a problem...There are different types of Mondomon digimon. I happen to be the prototype creation of these Mondomon. Each Mondomon has their way of fighting. The eight Mondomon digimon are: SparkMondomon, ScorchMondomon, CrashMondomon, RingMondomon, SpeedMondomon, HardMondomon, FreezeMondomon, and ScissorMondomon. Each one is superpowerful and are extremely tough to beat; so tough, Myotismon never stood a chance at all."

Lillymon: "Wow...."

Mondomon: "Which is why we must be careful as to what we are up against."

Lillymon: "Gotcha. I'll back you up."

Mondomon: "Thanks, Lillymon."

Lillymon: "No problem."

Mondomon and Lillymon make it to the mountaintop and into the portal to Team M.O.N.D.O.'s world where they must destroy eight Mondomon digimon to reach the fortress.
124111111.title: On to Team M.O.N.D.O.'s Mondomon Fortress

1241111111.content:

12411111111.content:

Lillymon: "I am not scared, Mondomon!!!"

Mondomon and Lillymon kept searching for the digimon they are expecting to run into in this area, until....
a large pair of scissors was heading for Lillymon.

Mondomon: "Don't worry Lillymon, you'll be out of that cage soon enough."

ScissorMondomon: "Rolling Cutter!!!!"

Mondomon dodged the scissors with ease and counterattacked...

Mondomon: "Powerful Buster!!!!"

Mondomon fires his shot at ScissorMondomon..the blast connects, but ScissorMondomon was far from beaten.

Mondomon blasted both scissors, but that gave ScissorMondomon the opening he needed. ScissorMondomon knocked Mondomon into the ground and laughed.

Mondomon: "Thanks....now off to the next Mondomon digimon."

They both blast Lillymon out of the way, FreezeMondomon blasted her with ice, and the battle continued.

FreezeMondomon generates an ice shield and blocks the attack.

Mondomon took a hit, but was not frozen.

FreezeMondmon got on his ice board and charged toward Mondomon...knocking him down. FreezeMondomon got off the board and before he could do anything else...Mondomon quickly grabbed FreezeMondomon's arm and copied his attack....the 'Freeze Slasher'.

FreezeMondomon tries to dodge the attack but the scissors cut of a microchip connected to FreezeMondmon's helmet.....FreezeMondmon later regained conciousness...

Mondomon: "Are you okay..."

FreezeMondomon: "I think so."

Mondomon: "I think you were on some sort of mind control."

FreezeMondomon: "Mind control?"

Lillymon comes back to Mondomon and sees them not fighting.

Lillymon: "Mondomon...what happened?"

Mondomon: "FreezeMondmon was under mind control."

FreezeMondomon: "Mondomon I see what you were trying to tell me....I am not a tool for destruction. Nobody manipulates ME!!!!!"

Mondomon: "So will you help us stop Team M.O.N.D.O."

FreezeMondomon: "I'll help you...but we may need to gather up all the Mondomon digimon."

Mondomon: "Not exactly...."

FreezeMondomon: "What do you mean???"

Mondomon: "ScissorMondomon is destroyed."

FreezeMondomon: "Ohhh......"

Lillymon: "Can we get out of here please???!!!"

Mondomon: "Let's go, guys."

FreezeMondomon: "Let's see if we can round up more digimon."

Mondomon, FreezeMondomon and Lillymon all head for the next region....

1242.content:
So, after growing some 200 ft., Lillymon had been thinking: "Hmm....I look so good now that I have grown to gigantic size.....I think Mimi would like me a lot better if she saw me like this."

After considering this thought, Lillymon decided to go visit Mimi in America, but she is afraid of what the people of the real world would think if she was seen as a giantess: "I should go visit Mimi in America, but she or anyone else never saw me at this size; at least if Mimi sees me like this, she would understand my story."

The giant Lillymon searches for the digi-port that would take her to America where Mimi is, but on account of her size, she can't really see where it is, so she resorted to crawling; that way she could find the digi-port a lot easier (as well as avoid destroying it in the process). Lillymon was crawling for a while, she was in the middle of the forest with some very strong branches. After some time, Lillymon finally found the digi-port. Thankfully, the digi-port was open so Lillymon went through it and finally landed in America. Thankfully, she was in the middle of Central Park and Mimi was there as well.

Much to Mimi's shock she noticed how big Lillymon was:
"Lillymon.....what happened to you????!!"

Lillymon explained: "We'll its like this, I was flying around in the digital world over some flowers and later noticed some larger flowers, later I investigated the flowers then without warning, I landed in this green liquid, and well.....this me now."

Mimi: "Well, I don't know what we are gonna do, but since you are here, let's do some shopping."

Lillymon: "But what if people see me, they'll think I am a giant monster trying to destroy the city."

Mimi: "Don't worry, leave that to me...."

Lillymon: "Oh, boy......this oughta be interesting..."
1242.title: Giant Lillymon comes to America

Lillymon's flower petaled gloves ripped revealing her delicate, smooth (yet huge) hands; her boots also tore, revealing her dainty, gigantic feet. (Her flower helmet and flower dress remained) Lillymon was shocked to see some of her attire get ripped.

choices: Screw Cherubimon, let's party in the Real World!
125.content:
Ranamon watched as the other Digimon fled her approach. As an agent of Cherubimon, she was feared by many as an Evil Legendary Warrior. She was a bit self consious, though, because she was the weakest of the five.
The saw the mountain's fractyl code in front of her, but this code was different. It was double encrypted, which meant it held twice as much data. She wonered what effect stealing the code would have on her.
"well," she said in her Scarlet O'Hara accent. "Ah guess thar's only one way to find out!"
She absorbed the code and immeadiatly felt strange. Her whole body began to grow, larger and larger, until she stood an impressive two hundred feet tall.
"Ah do declare," she boomed. "Ah believe Im' now the strongest of the Legendary Warriors. What to do?"
125.title: Southern Belle

choices: Ranamon's size simply doubles, no additional side effects...
She grows, but is forced to slide evolve into Calmaramon & she can't turn back!
She gains the ability to control her size (and the size of others) at will!
1251.content:
Ranamon stomped off to another area, enjoying the terrified screams of the tiny digimon fleeing from her enormous feet. Within moments she arrived at her destination. Looking down at the minuscule landscape below, Ranamon decided that she wanted to become bigger as soon as possible and she didn't want to waste any time devouring this areas fractal code. She took an monumental leap into the air, positioned her body for a massive belly-flop, and fell back toward the ground. The instant that the massive mermaid collided with the ground below, her body pulverized all of the surroundings into oblivion. Ranamon was completely oblivious to the sheer number of digimon that she had crushed out of existence with her little stunt. One (unfortunate?) digimon even wound up compressed between the giantess's colossal cleavage! Ranamon stood back up from the crater that her goddess-like form had left in the ground and looked down. She quickly located the area's fractal code among the rubble and proceeded to claim her prize. Plucking the massive (but minuscule to her) ball of clustered data from the ground below between her thumb and index finger, Ranamon lifted it over her gaping maw and dropped it into the void. She immediately began to feel the data cluster taking its effect, augmenting her already formidable form and making her even more dangerous!

But exactly what effect will the addition of more fractal code to her data have on Ranamon's body?
1251.title: Just how much data is that!!!

choices: One of the past digimon timeline (first, second or third season)
Still in the current digimon timeline (fourth season, she went to episode 1)
Ranamon ended up in a future digimon timeline (fifth, sixth season)
1252.content:
Ranamon stomped off to another area, enjoying the terrified screams of the tiny digimon fleeing from her enormous feet. Within moments she arrived at her destination.Ranamon decided to have some fun with the puny digimon that were running from her. She took an monumental leap into the air, positioned her body for a massive belly-flop, and fell back toward the ground. The instant that the massive mermaid collided with the ground below, her body pulverized all of the surroundings into oblivion. Ranamon was completely oblivious to the sheer number of digimon that she had crushed out of existence with her little stunt. One (unfortunate?) digimon even wound up compressed between the giantess's colossal cleavage! Ranamon stood back up from the crater that her goddess-like form had left in the ground and looked down.

Feeling that wasn't enough, Ranamon knelt down and, cupping her massive hands, scooped up thousands of digimon in them and she stood to her full 200-foot-high, some attempting to escape, mostly those that could fly, but the panicked mob dragged them down, all shouting to be taken along, some attempting to attack her hands, but they didn't even register due to how large Ranamon was, and some attempted to climb up her fingers, but ended up falling and deleting themselves upon impact with the ground.

Laughing, Ranamon raised her hands over her head and tilted it backwards, her mouth open wide and tilted her hands so that the digimon in them were sent down into her waiting mouth, screaming all the while. She didn't even need to chew or worry about watching her figure, they were all so small compared to her as she gave them all the biggest honor she felt anyone could ever have; becoming a part of her.

As the numerous digimon disappeared down her gullet, the giantess felt a shift in her code, something that was so useful that her body had assimilated it. Curious, Ranamon twirled her finger in the air counterclockwise and her eyes widened as the state of the landscape reversed right before her eyes to before she'd done her belly-flop. Doing it again, this time clockwise, Ranamon watched as things fast-forward to how they were AFTER her dive.

Her eyes widened as the implications of that set in. The data her body found useful enough to add to herself...it must have been a Clockmon, a Machine Digimon whose name and design were derived from the alarm clock. They protect "Time" and "Space", and were able to freely advance and rewind time. Because they possess such an extremely dangerous, terrifying ability, they always maintain a neutral standpoint, and always refused to participate in conflict. For that reason, it is said that if a Clockmon were ever tilts toward either side of the balance of Good and Evil, the Digital World would collapse.

She had gained that power?!

The idea made Ranamon grin. Not only was she the Legendary Warrior of water, and a two hundred-foot-tall giantess, but she had control of time and space, too!

Ho, she naturally knew all about how 71 percent of the planet's surface is water-covered, and the oceans held about 96.5 percent of all water, but how water also existed in the air as water vapor, in rivers and lakes, in icecaps and glaciers, in the ground as soil moisture and in aquifers, and even that water exists within all living things.

Between that, her new size, and how she possessed the ability to sense, manipulate, and control all forms of water water through her very nature as the Legendary Water Warrior making it so she had hydrokinesis, she felt that she was more than simply, as she had stated earlier, "the strongest of the Legendary Warriors."

No...she was more in the class of the four Digimon Sovereigns, an all-powerful goddess in her own right! Ranamon grinned at the sheer thought of it.

As that idea struck her, Ranamon had a sudden epiphany. There was nothing like having supreme power to make one stop and think. Especially about one's role in it...

"Why should Ah listen to Cherubimon anymore?" Ranamon wondered, she could probably overthrow him now if she felt so inclined, and while the idea was tempting enough to do now, and even though she WOULD do it...there was something she had always wanted to see: the Human World.

Getting there'd be simple for her now! Heck, she could most likely take it over and then rule BOTH worlds! The idea of all those diminutive humans and digimon all worshiping her...the idea stroked her vanity rather well.

Snapping her fingers, she focused on thinking up a point in time when humans had entered the digital world or vice versa. She felt the time-based power activate and the flow of time pass through and around her according to her own will. As it did, she laughed.

Like she had previously come to realize, between her new size, her new ability to freely manipulate time, and how she possessed the ability to sense, manipulate, and control all forms of water water through her very nature as the Legendary Water Warrior making it so she had hydrokinesis, she'd have BOTH worlds in the palm of her hand in no time.

When the sensation of time travel receded, the aquatic giantess was in...
1252.title: The Sea Goddess Cometh
